name: In re Petition of the TRUSTEE OF the ROOSEVELT-BENTMAN TRUST FOR AMERICAN VOTERS on Behalf of SENATOR A, Senator B and Representative C. Petition of Peter J. Wirs, Trustee
name_abbreviation: In re the Trustee of the Roosevelt-Bentman Trust for American Voters ex rel. Senator A

parties: In re Petition of the TRUSTEE OF the ROOSEVELT-BENTMAN TRUST FOR AMERICAN VOTERS on Behalf of SENATOR A, Senator B and Representative C. Petition of Peter J. Wirs, Trustee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of April, 2016, the Application for Exercise of King’s Bench Powers, the Application for Expedited Disposition, the “Rule Nisi (Order to Show Cause),” and the Application for Leave to Reply to Answer are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
135 A.3d 177
In re Petition of the TRUSTEE OF the ROOSEVELT-BENTMAN TRUST FOR AMERICAN VOTERS on Behalf of SENATOR A, Senator B and Representative C. Petition of Peter J. Wirs, Trustee.
No. 28 EM 2016.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 20, 2016.
